This is a package that makes it easy to download and compile libode with correct settings for RobotToolKit. Before running catkin_make, you must do the following:
1) roscd rtk_libode
2) python ./rtk_libode_scripts/rtk_libode_setup.py
3) configuring and compiling takes a while
3) done! you can return to catkin_ws and do catkin_make
